alert.note: Alert for Eastern San Miguel County; Harding County; Quay County; Union County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 02 at 7:56PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT EAST CENTRAL SAN MIGUEL...EASTERN HARDING...NORTHEASTERN QUAY AND SOUTHEASTERN UNION COUNTIES THROUGH 830 PM MDT... At 755 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Bueyeros to 10 miles southeast of Conchas. Movement was east northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Logan, Amistad, Nara Visa, Bueyeros, Hayden, Ute Lake State Park, Sedan, and Rosebud. This includes State Road 104 between Mile Markers 84 and 95. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM MDT for northeastern and east central New Mexico. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH

area.areaDesc: Eastern San Miguel County; Harding County; Quay County; Union County
